item.title: Announcing lettre 0.10.0-rc.1
item.description: We are pleased to announce the first release candidate of the next version of lettre, an email client for the Rust programming language. lettre allows sending emails from Rust applications, focusing on ease of use, secure defaults and modern features (like support for full internationalization). It does not aim at implementing email RFCs extensively, but only what is necessary for our needs. lettre provides a type-safe email builder, several transports, tls support with rustls and native-tls and async support with tokio and async-std.
